title: The Basketball Player's Obsession
description: Cindy Crews is everything I never even knew I dreamed of. Winning the championship used to be my number one goal in life, but one look into Cindy's pretty golden eyes, and I see my future.But Cindy is a feisty little thing who's fighting me every step of the way. I know she feels this electric current zinging between us, but she's put up walls so thick it's going to take a bulldozer to knock them down.Fortunately, I don't mind bulldozing over anything in my path to victory. This is the most important game I've ever playedâ€”and I'm not talking about on the basketball court. Everything hinges on me breaking down Cindy's defenses and convincing her that she's meant to be my woman.Losing is not an option.
author: Emma Bray
